creator: bodewig@apache.org
text:
Which JDK is that?  I cannot find a java.lang.Method in JDK 1.3.1 (or any other
for that matter).

Looks to be somethign strange in your JDK or your setup. In any case the code
has been changed over to explicit imports which should correct any problems. Can
you try a recent nightly build or CVS checkout now.
creator: conor@apache.org
